title: Friday Cocktails
description: Good music by DJs Ayaz & Bigboyqooqoo. Carry pack allowed at R50 corkage. Bottle of spirits allowed at R250 corkage.

title: Sunday Session
description: Music by Romeo, Smi Da Dj, Mbe supported by resident DJs. Dress to impress. Free parking. 10H00 till late.

title: Xmas Eve
description: Music served by Real Yano, Mbasa, Warra MVP.

title: Saturday Bottles And Buckets
venue: Tiger's Milk Kitchen/Bar, Moffett On Main
description: Music by DJs Mleistar And Rootraction. Free Entry. 18H00 Till Late.

title: NYE Celebrations
description: 90s and 2000s hip hop classics all night long. 15H00 Till Late. Empty Coolers Only. Free Entrance.

title: Sunday Back Outside Live
description: Live perfomances by Yanga Happysoul & Jerome Backed by Afrogroove SA and DJ Rego. 15H00 Till Late. Free Entrance.

title: Pretty Girls Love Sundays
venue: IZA Sip Eat Vibe, Humewood Beachfront
description: Featuring Mbasa on the decks. 15:00 Till Late. Free Entry.

title: Finally Friday
description: Live DJs. Tequila shots R25 all night. 18H00 Till Late. Casual dress code.

title: Sunday Brunch Sinf Along
description: Sounds by Abuti Jerome, Olex and Axe. Brunch 7 Colour Feast R185 pp.
